projects.title: Movie DataBase Site
projects.description: A complete movie database site where users can browse movies. Movies can be searched by title or by genre.

projects.title: Video Conferencing WebApp
projects.description: A Video Conferencing WebApp where users can connect by creating/joining rooms. It has the added functionality of sending text messages.
